Page Contents

    Getting Started

    Brightcove Gallery™ makes it easy to create and publish videos experiences so viewers can consume your content wherever they may be. This page describes the key concepts to help you understand and be successful using Gallery to create video experiences. For more information, see the following concepts:

    Sign up for a free trial account here.

    Concept Description
    Getting Started

     

    These documents will give you a set of hands-on steps you can follow to create Gallery experiences.

    • Creating and Publishing a Portal Experience
    • Creating and Publishing an In-Page Experience
    Product Overview

     

    These topics provide a high level overview of working with Gallery.

    • Getting Started with Brightcove Gallery
    • Overview of Gallery Experiences
    • Creating and Managing Gallery Experiences
    • Training on Demand: Introduction to Gallery
    Templates

    Templates control the overall look and feel of the experience. Learn about the types of templates that are available.

    • Overview of Gallery Portal Templates
    • Overview of Gallery In-Page Experience Templates
    Configuring Gallery Settings

    Configure a default player, create custom domains and configure YouTube integration.

    • Configuring Gallery Settings
    Let's Build an Experience

    Select the type of Experience you want to create:

    • Portal
    • In-Page
    • Landing Page
    • Live Event (Portal)
    • Live Event (In-Page)
    Training

    Training is also available to help you get started:

    • Introduction to Gallery
    • Building Portal Experiences using Gallery
    • Building In-Page Experiences using Gallery
    • Gallery Training Videos
